page.title: 12ANIMALS
page.content: { PETS We wanted to know what kinds of domestic animals there are in our survey area.We asked children aged between 10 and 11 attending County Primary Schools in our area this question:What pets have your family? The results showed the following list: 17 dogs,5 cats,6 tortoise,5 rabbits, 6 horses,3 budgerigars,2 guinea pigs. 13 families had fish in tanks and one had 3 frogs. Only three families had no pets. {DOMESTICATED In our area farm animals consist mainly of dairy cattle;Jersey and Freisian;and young cattle reared for beef. There are also some sheep.Some people who have large garden or extra acres keep goats and poultrey-beacause they enjoy goat's milk and fresh eggs.
